author: smrenna
body:
#### PR description:

Pythia8.3 was crashing at lumi sections whenever UserHooks were activated.

The code is now expected to run.

#### PR validation:

This has been tested with a modification of test/Py8_Z2_tautau_cfg.py that: 1) doesn't have undefined variables in it!
2) quickly makes lumi blocks

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
title: Pythia83 compatability changes
